code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{StoreContext}from"./StoreContext";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductCard=_ref=>{let{product}=_ref;const{wishlist,addToWishlist,removeFromWishlist}=useContext(StoreContext);const isWishlisted=wishlist.some(item=>item.id===product.id);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/product/".concat(product.id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.image,alt:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\u20B9",product.price]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"wishlist-btn",onClick:()=>isWishlisted?removeFromWishlist(product.id):addToWishlist(product),children:isWishlisted?"‚ù§Ô∏è Remove":"ü§ç Wishlist"})]});};export default ProductCard;
